data.name: Liftoff - DJI FPV
data.detailed_description:
The DJI FPV downloadable content is available as a free download, for a limited time.

Included in the DLC

The DLC pack contains a fully flyable DJI FPV drone, an authentic HUD, and a virtual twin of the DJI FPV Remote Controller 2.

This is not a full simulation of the DJI FPV feature set, but offers virtual pilots:
  • Manual mode
  • Normal mode (without assist features)

About DJI FPV


The DJI FPV system is a flagship product line created by drone technology innovator DJI. Their new DJI FPV drone system combines the power of first person drone flying with their established hi-tech camera systems. They have achieved this through an unparalleled commitment to R&D, a culture of constant innovation and curiosity, and a focus on transforming complex technology into easy-to-use devices.

data.short_description: A free DLC pack that brings the DJI FPV drone system to Liftoff :FPV Drone Racing The DJI FPV system combines the power of first person drone flying with their established hi-tech camera systems.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French
*languages with full audio support
